statements: SELECT * FROM agroforestry_management_data;
SELECT tree_species, height_in_meters FROM agroforestry_management_data WHERE diameter_in_cm > 10;
SELECT location, planting_date FROM agroforestry_management_data WHERE height_in_meters < 5.0;
SELECT * FROM agroforestry_management_data WHERE location = 'Farm1';
SELECT tree_species, diameter_in_cm FROM agroforestry_management_data ORDER BY diameter_in_cm DESC;
SELECT * FROM agroforestry_management_data WHERE height_in_meters > 3.5 AND diameter_in_cm < 20.0 ORDER BY planting_date DESC, tree_species ASC;
SELECT id, tree_species, planting_date FROM agroforestry_management_data WHERE location LIKE '%Grove%' ORDER BY planting_date;
SELECT tree_species, COUNT(*) AS total_trees FROM agroforestry_management_data GROUP BY tree_species HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT id, tree_species, planting_date, location FROM agroforestry_management_data WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM agroforestry_management_data WHERE location = 'Forest' AND tree_species IN ('Oak','Maple') ORDER BY diameter_in_cm DESC;
SELECT * FROM agroforestry_data WHERE tree_type='Mango'
SELECT tree_type, planting_date FROM agroforestry_data WHERE location_id=1
SELECT * FROM management_logs WHERE supervisor_id=5 ORDER BY log_date DESC
SELECT tree_type, planting_date, location_id FROM agroforestry_data WHERE id=3
SELECT activity, supervisor_id, log_date FROM management_logs WHERE tree_id=10
SELECT * FROM agroforestry_data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT tree_type, planting_date FROM agroforestry_data WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM management_logs WHERE supervisor_id = 5 ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT tree_type, COUNT(*) AS total_trees FROM agroforestry_data GROUP BY tree_type ORDER BY total_trees DESC;
SELECT activity, supervisor_id FROM management_logs WHERE tree_id = 10;
SELECT plot_name, plot_location, plot_size FROM Agroforestry_Plots
SELECT tree_species, tree_height FROM Trees
SELECT log_id, harvest_date, quantity, harvested_product FROM Harvest_Log
SELECT * FROM Agroforestry_Plots INNER JOIN Trees ON Agroforestry_Plots.plot_id = Trees.plot_id
SELECT * FROM Trees WHERE tree_height > 3
SELECT * FROM Agroforestry_Plots;
SELECT plot_name, plot_location, plot_size FROM Agroforestry_Plots WHERE plot_size > 500;

SELECT Trees.tree_species, Harvest_Log.harvested_product, Agroforestry_Plots.plot_location FROM Trees JOIN Harvest_Log ON Trees.tree_id = Harvest_Log.tree_id JOIN Agroforestry_Plots ON Trees.plot_id = Agroforestry_Plots.plot_id;
SELECT * FROM Trees WHERE tree_height > 10 AND tree_diameter < 3;

SELECT Agroforestry_Plots.plot_name AS Plot, Harvest_Log.harvested_product AS Product, COUNT(*) AS Total_Harvests FROM Agroforestry_Plots JOIN Trees ON Agroforestry_Plots.plot_id = Trees.plot_id JOIN Harvest_Log ON Trees.tree_id = Harvest_Log.tree_id GROUP BY Agroforestry_Plots.plot_name, Harvest_Log.harvested_product;
SELECT plant_name, species, growth_stage FROM agroforestry_plants;
SELECT * FROM agroforestry_harvest WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT plant_name, planting_date FROM agroforestry_plants WHERE growth_stage = 3;
SELECT policy_name, date_effective FROM agroforestry_policies ORDER BY date_effective DESC;
SELECT * FROM agroforestry_sustainability WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM agroforestry_plants;
SELECT plant_name, species FROM agroforestry_plants WHERE growth_stage > 3 ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(sustainability_score) AS avg_score, MAX(sustainability_score) AS max_score FROM agroforestry_sustainability;

SELECT plant_name, planting_date, quantity, unit FROM agroforestry_plants JOIN agroforestry_harvest ON agroforestry_plants.plant_id = agroforestry_harvest.plant_id WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT plant_name, species FROM agroforestry_plants WHERE species LIKE 'Oak%' AND plant_name ILIKE '%tree%';
SELECT * FROM Tree
SELECT tree_name, tree_species, tree_age FROM Tree
SELECT tree_id, tree_height FROM Tree ORDER BY tree_height DESC
SELECT * FROM Plantation WHERE location = 'XYZ'
SELECT farmer_name, contact_number FROM Farmer
SELECT * FROM Tree WHERE tree_species = 'Maple' ORDER BY tree_age DESC;
SELECT tree_name, tree_height FROM Tree WHERE tree_age > 50 ORDER BY tree_name ASC;
SELECT plantation_name, location FROM Plantation WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT harvest_date, yield FROM Harvest WHERE yield > 100 ORDER BY harvest_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Farmer WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY farmer_name ASC;
